meaningMnemonic: If you grind <radical>rice</radical>, every <radical>part</radical> of it, eventually it will become a fine <kanji>powder</kanji>. You can then use this rice powder as a part to create some other dish. Some kind of cake, perhaps.
readingMnemonic: Actually, grinding the rice down to a <kanji>powder</kanji> is super <reading>fun</reading> (ふん). It’s so fun you don’t want to stop! AH HAHAHAHA! RICE POWDER! SO FUN!
